name: diun
tagline: A notification tool that alerts when Docker images receive updates
description: Diun (Docker Image Update Notifier) is a CLI and webhook-based tool that notifies you when Docker images are updated. It's ideal for automated maintenance and integrates well with CI/CD pipelines.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Get alerted when Docker images are updated. Stay informed automatically

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Monitor images from Docker Hub, GHCR, and private registries. Universal coverage

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Trigger actions when updates are detected. Automated workflows

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage for efficient monitoring. Run anywhere Docker runs
